title: Time to stop playing until Sated Devourer is removed or changed? I think so. **OPAF**
body:
Official Petition Against Freelo == OPAF Sated Devourer.

This item is so fucking broken, I mean I'm all for bringing diversity to the jungle with Warwicks and Kayles and Master Yi's. Especially Warwick, I miss that crazy wolf. However, to bring an item back that makes anybody unkillable who has BotRK and any form of lifesteal is just ridiculous. Not to mention that their damage is so outrageous that they could top the charts participating in only half of the fights. Look at Kayle, this chick can wipe out an entire team in less than 3 seconds with 4 items built including shoes and sated. When is the line going to be drawn?

I am honestly just sick of Riot coming up with complete unbalanced bullshit, and allowing it to basically be "tested" by giving all these asshat kids freelo. This is supposed to be a game of skill, strategy, and teamwork. It was a game of who can pick Ezreal, and now it's a game of who can pick Shyvana, Xin, Master Yi, or Kayle. Come the fuck on this really can't be non-lobotimized human beings coming up with what they call "balance" in this game.

The Lifesteal is nothing to write home about, lol. In a serious engage, it's not going to do you any good.

I'm not trying to defend it just because I am using it(I am) but I honestly don't think it's what people are making it out to be. Sated requires a delicate, fragile playstyle that is easily shattered.
All lanes are winning.. oh wait yi just hit his thirtieth stack on devourer... runs in and quadra kill. Nothing about that is delicate.

You left out udyr! With only 2 items he can kill ppl in just 2 autos at the 20 min mark of the game. Phoenix stance does a bonus 200 magic dmg on the first auto, and devourer + wits end passive magic dmg gets doubled on the second auto, plus his Q's passive 200 magic dmg. 2 auto attacks and your dead. Rito definitely did not think this item through. Broken as all hell. I'm definitely not playing ranked until this item gets dismantled. Cuz if youre not playing udyr or another retardedly broken sated devourer jungler, youre team is going to get wrecked. Rito does these things to "increase champion diversity", yet b\c of this OP item there will be no diversity over the next 2 weeks while we wait for the next patch to fix it. Either you play a runeglaive or devourer jungler right now or dont even bother playing ranked
